title: Scotch Ale (Classic Beer Style Series #8)
description:
Scotch Ale (Classic Beer Style Series #8)

By Greg Noonan

In Scotch Ale, Greg Noonan presents keen insights into yeast, hops, malts, water and brewing conditions that will help you achieve a superior batch of Scotch ale.

The Classic Beer Style Series from Brewers Publications examines individual world-class beer styles, covering origins, history, sensory profiles, brewing techniques and commercial examples.
